If you're like me, there's nothing you enjoy more than hopping up on a couch,...
...destroying  a few pillows and chewing on a good shoe.
So, this new Nest Dropcam is a serious buzzkill.
It's always watching so people can keep an eye on me when they're away and...
...even chime in with their inane reprimands.
Who's to say who's a bad boy and who is not?
Seems so subjective if you ask me.
Welcome to a more thoughtful home.
